headlines.headline: Wembanyama 'horrified' by Minnesota shootings
headlines.description: Victor Wembanyama articulates his thoughts on a pair of fatal shootings by federal agents in Minnesota.

headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Latest updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline

headlines.headline: Windy: The Bucks need to either tank or trade Giannis
headlines.description: Brian Windhorst says the Bucks aren't actively looking to trade Giannis Antetokounmpo right now and that there is a pathway for Milwaukee to "tank.‚Äù

headlines.headline: LeBron James vs. Cleveland: Top performances against Cavaliers
headlines.description: The Los Angeles Lakers star holds a 9-3 record while averaging 31.2 points, 8.9 rebounds and 7.1 assists as an opponent in Cleveland.

headlines.headline: The Lakers, the Cavaliers and LeBron's most dominant season ever
headlines.description: There are many similarities between this Lakers team and its season and the Cavaliers in 2017-18, which James says remains the best campaign of his illustrious career. He returns to Cleveland on Wednesday night.

headlines.headline: NBA Power Rankings: Can the Pistons or Spurs catch the Thunder for top spot?

headlines.headline: Stephen A. calls for boycott of NFL Hall of Fame after Belichick snub
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith demands a boycott of the NFL Hall of Fame after Bill Belichick was snubbed from this year's class.

headlines.headline: Who are the winningest NFL coaches of all time?
headlines.description: From Belichick to Reid, there are many iconic coaches in NFL history. Who has the best career record? Check out the stat breakdown now.

headlines.headline: Who has won the most Super Bowl rings? Coach, QB, more stats
headlines.description: Tom Brady has won more Super Bowls than any other player in NFL history. Check out other top winners by position now.

headlines.headline: Which NFL team has the most Super Bowl wins?
headlines.description: There have been many memorable Super Bowls, but which teams have won the most rings? Check out this all-time winners list for more information.

headlines.headline: NFeLementary, the football-based curriculum taking over Mary Crippen's classroom
headlines.description: Mary Crippen, a third grade educator based in Florida, built NFeLementary by expanding on a football-based curriculum her mother created decades earlier.

headlines.headline: Foxworth: 'I feel like Aaron Rodgers is not the answer' for Steelers
headlines.description: Domonique Foxworth voices his concerns about the Steelers potentially bringing back Aaron Rodgers at quarterback. has context menu

headlines.headline: Red Wings sign Ben Chiarot to 3-year, $11.55M extension
headlines.description: The Detroit Red Wings on Wednesday signed veteran defenseman Ben Chiarot to a three-year contract extension worth $11.55 million.
